Hi... 
I just spoke with attorney (Jack Scarola), following up on our requests to interview her. Her attorney 
thought she might want to reach out to our team directly, and asked for a number, so I've given him your contact 
information, in case she wants to call our team directly. Just wanted to give you a heads up that there's a small chance 
you'll hear from her. 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
New York, NY 10007 
EFTA00027345
